definition: Enjo-kōsai or "compensated dating", a practice which originated in Japan where older men give money or luxury gifts to women for their companionship and sexual favors

sentences.english: It was in this context that international support and scrutiny were critical.
sentences.chinese: 正因爲是在這種情況下，國際援助和監督才很重要。

sentences.english: There are also humanitarian uses for sniffer bees.
sentences.chinese: 嗅探蜂還能應用於人道主義援助。

sentences.english: The former russian satellite now turn to the west for help.
sentences.chinese: 從前俄國的衛星國現在轉向西方要求援助。

sentences.english: Fourthly, the international community should increase aid to Africa.
sentences.chinese: 第四，加強國際社會的對非援助。

sentences.english: The man declined my offer of help.
sentences.chinese: 那人婉謝我的援助之意。

sentences.english: Customarily, the austerity measures have to be in place as the aid package takes effect.
sentences.chinese: 在援助計劃生效的同時，緊縮措施通常必須到位。

sentences.english: Gates said that the effectiveness of aid is not well-publicised.
sentences.chinese: 蓋茨說援助的有效性沒有被充分宣傳。

sentences.english: While impressive, Zoellick said this level of support was not enough.
sentences.chinese: 佐利克說，儘管這一援助水平很高，但仍顯不夠。

sentences.english: Ice-breaker assistance resumed at 0800 local time.
sentences.chinese: 破冰援助在當地時間0800時恢復。

sentences.english: The target is seven-tenths of 1% of gross national income.
sentences.chinese: 這項標準是援助達到國家粗收入的千分之七。

sentences.english: There will be nomoretax-funded more tax-funded bailouts, period.
sentences.chinese: 不會有更多的稅款資助的緊急援助的時期。

sentences.english: But Holmes notes the most dramatic need is in Pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 然而，霍姆斯指出，最迫切需要援助的是巴基斯坦。

sentences.english: The king of Zhao accpeted the gifts gladly and sent a hundred thousand troops to help Qi.
sentences.chinese: 趙王見了禮物十分高興，派了十萬士兵去援助齊國。

sentences.english: The company is dependent on government financial help.
sentences.chinese: 這家公司依靠政府的財政援助。

sentences.english: And therefore, effectiveness of aid to them will inevitably suffer.
sentences.chinese: 因而，對這些國家援助效果無疑將會受到損害。

sentences.english: We must co-ordinate our efforts to help the flood victims.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該同心協力以援助遭水災的災民。

definition: to go to war/to engage in war
to reinforce/to increase troop numbers/reinforcements/extra troops
